Articles.Content:
Hello Mates!

Today i'm challenging you all! From youtubers to gamers and newbies. The challenge is: Making A Super Cool Space Hotel For Your Kerbals!

The challenge is simples, you can use mods and even Hiper Edit, you just need to show off your Space Hotel, if you desire to launch the hotel from Kerbin, part by part, you can! If you just want to construct and send it to space using cheats or HyperEdit, you can! Just show off your cool Hotel c:

Rulez:

- Screenshots/Video need to be in orbit around Kerbin (HIGH OR LOW ORBIT, YOU DECIDE)

- The Screenshot/Video need to make a good view of your Space Hotel.

- There need to have at least 6 Kerbals in the Hotel.

- You can use any mod you want to build it.

- Need to have a name.

- Need to have Solar Panels.

- Need to have at least 90 parts.

- The Hotel itself can't have more than 3 engines.

That's it mates, hope to see some good hotels around here!

Thats my one, the Orion Space Hotel Station

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/xz30b/embed"></iframe>

I Used Interstellar Mod, MechJeb, MMM Mod, LLL Mod, HyperEdite and some other mods in this one.
I just want to say that I like your space hotel, especially the gravity-wheel structure thing.

Something like this? Latest module to arrive at my Minmus base.
